title: Battery sizing-energy storage
fullText:
Batteries for energy storage should be sized according to the following equation:
C	=	Etot Ã—	Taut
 
x

where
 

   
Vdc	DODmax
 
. . . 3.4.7.3
 
Cx	=	battery capacity, specified for an appropriate discharge rate x, in ampere hours (Ah)
Etot	=	total design daily energy demand from the d.c. bus, in watt hours (Wh)
Taut	=	number of days of autonomy
Vdc	=	nominal voltage of the d.c. bus (i.e. battery voltage), in volts (V)
DODmax	=	design maximum depth of discharge of the battery, expressed as a percentage
